title: Rawal Dam spillways set to open Saturday morning as reservoir hits 1,750 feet
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 25 (APP):Rawal Damâ€™s spillway gates will be opened at 6:00 AM on Saturday, after the reservoir reaches the 1,750.00-foot mark, according to a spokesman of National Disaster Management Authority (NDMA).
Citing dam officials, NDMA has issued a preemptive alert to all relevant institutions, anticipating increased water flow in Korang Nullah.
In a public advisory, NDMA has urged residents living near Korang Nullah to exercise caution.
The public is strongly advised to avoid crossing the nullah and any temporary bridges during periods of strong water flow.
Authorities have urged all concerned individuals and relevant agencies to exercise caution and coordinate closely with the local administration to prevent any untoward incidents during the spillway release.
For assistance or further information, contact SDO, Rawal Dam, Islamabad.
